attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are campaigning to abolish the unnecessary irritation of the letter Q from our alphabet. For too long, the letter U has been plagued by having to help Q to make the pathetic ‘qu’ sound which could easily be replicated with ‘cw’. This must end! 
Respectfully yours,
The Undersigned.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
